value.title: Translate YouTube subtitles using Power BI and Google Translate - Download 29
value.excerpt: Today is a bit odd video, but hopefully useful either way. value.title: Trim column headers with spaces in between words in one step in Power Query
value.excerpt: There is a trim function in Power Query to get rid of spaces at the beginning or end of a phrase, but unlike excel trim, it wont get rid of excess whitespaces between words.  In this video, I will show you how to get rid of all spaces no matter where they are on one step in power query.  Other column

value.title: Understand how your Power BI queries are built (sources, source types, etc)
